title: Get rid of Kalista's slow
body: The kiting with her passive is bad enough. She doesn't need 2 tools to help her kite.

replies.body: I think she needs to have some sort of CC in her kit, I think a better option would be to move the slow to her Q since that ability is kinda lackluster as it is now and putting her CC on a skillshot would make her more tolerable.
...Why do you think she needs some sort of cc? Her whole gimmick is permakiting and chasing. Of all the champions in the game she probably needs cc the least.

Almost all champions have some form of CC in their kit and the ones that don't usually have have high burst, the only exception to that I can think of is Ezreal. 

Kalista is a pain I agree, but I'm looking for more balanced nerfs. Putting her slow on her Q would make it single target, dependent on a skillshot, and not also attached to her main damage source so she would need to level it in order to improve the slow and that would cost damage in her E and W.

Yeah, champions tend to have high cc or burst because they can't consistently put out their dps over extended periods of time. Kalista's passive completely solves that problem for her. She can continuously dps while kiting and chasing. I'm saying from a design perspective she is the champion in the game that probably least requires cc to do her job.
Very true.

Who is... good a kiting (and sniping).  Remiinds you of someone else who's good at kiting (and engaging/saving a teammate) and who also has decent burst once she has stacked her spears? ( a delayed burst of damage?)

I have to agree the slow just seems out of place. Or actually, I think the passive looks out of place. Kalista is 2 champions in one : a team carry and a selfish kiting carry.
Her passive is truly out of place in that it has absolutely nothing to do with what her main theme is supposed to be which is having an aothsworn that she works with to bring out her full potential.

Just a tidbit, I read on the forum that they said her passive was actually the origin of her kit. So maybe it's the rest of the kit (ult, W, slow) that are out of place. The spear-stacking kinda fits with the kiting carry theme. Gameplay wise at least.

Also I'll give you that the passive is out of place. I sincerely beleive that too. but as long as it's there, the slow feels out of place with the passive. Or more precisely, it goes too well with it.

I guess it's supposed to make her a relentless spirit? That also can use it to avoid being caught...

Uh... Yeah you're right. I would expect this kind of hopping more from a different sort of champion.
By God...every champion has CC except for Ezreal, that is crazy
not true, there is Yi, Kat, and mord
I had a brain fart the size of Jupiter. But STILL only 4, that's remarkable.
Morde is even more special though. He is the only champion in the game without cc or any time of *mobility*.

Why does Vayne need CC? 
Her whole Gimmick is uncounterable true damage and tank busting and chasing.

Why does MF need CC her whole gimmick is high magic and physical damage.

Same logic different champions.

don't forget she still has her ult.  right now she has the cc of malphite (and the initiation capability), the damage of zed, the mobility of...well nobody because she has the most broken free dashes in the game, the poke of varus, the gank safety of teemo, and the ally bonus damage nuke of leona

She's getting nerfed, read the patch notes, thanks.
Go read said notes, and you'll find they don't change her slow at all.

I hope people aren't getting the wrong impression from this. I'm not saying that her passive is bad. Her passive is what makes her unique, and I think that's fine as is, but the slow is completely unnecessary. When you throw in the exhaust her support has, it makes her almost impossible to catch.
